name: Maniac Outhouse (C64)
description:
My first "Adventure Game": Maniac Outhouse!
The Challenge... set an adventure in a house that's the exact opposite of a multi-room mansion.

In this (barely) Point & Click adventure you have one goal ...It is a very short "game"!

(No instructions)

Made with Gary Kitchen's Game Maker.

This game is in D64 format and is meant to be run in a Commodore 64 emulator
